page.title: 16BANCHORY ACADEMY
page.content: BANCHORY ACADEMY HAS CHANGED DRAMATICALLY WHILE I HAVE BEEN AT THE PRIMARY SCHOOL.FROM OLD,ISOLATED BUILDINGS IT IS NOW A MODERN COMPACT SCHOOL.ONCE THERE WERE CONCRETE PATHS NOW LARGE,GRANITE BUILDINGS. CONSTRUCTIONS STARTED IN MARCH 1981.BY JANUARY 1983 THE FIRST NEW BUILDING WAS COMPLETED.THIS WAS THE ADMIN. BLOCK.THEN THE LINK BLOCK WAS FINISHED.THIS CONTAINS A SWIMMING POOL,CANTEEN AREA,AND NEW CLASSROOMS. THE MUSIC WING REPLACED TEMPORARY HUTS AND A LECTURE THEATRE COMPLETED WORK IN 1983.THE NEXT PHASE RENOVATED THE OLD SCHOOL.THE LAST PHASE WILL BE COMPLETED SOON.THIS WILL BE USED FOR CLASSROOMS.THE COST OF THE IMPROVEMENTS AND NEW BUILDINGS WILL BE 4 000 000 POUNDS.
